description: Get a taste for racing with this FREE Lite version of Tilt GT! ****** Get ready to tilt as you race to the finish line! Run against the clock, or play in unique ghost mode in which you chase your own past best attempts. Compete for top positions in global leaderboards, watch other players' replays and test your skills racing their ghosts. Offline scores support lets you play while you are away from the Internet and submit your progress at a later time. FEATURES: * 20 tracks * three game modes * traffic challenges * social multiplayer * nitro powerups * global scores * ghost racing
